anya-e0603n1:12_0: Having given up a Wheel-Turning Monarch,
anya-e0603n1:14_0: I’ve gone to the Moon God’s Grove,
anya-e0603n1:18_0: on the couch of the luxurious couch;
anya-e0603n1:19_0: the knowledge master, and no more;
anya-e0603n1:24_0: in all the world with its gods,
anya-e0603n1:2_0: And with the realm of the gods,
anya-e0603n1:33_0: as an ox fond of crops.
anya-e0603n1:34_0: But the fire burning from the sacred flame,
anya-e0603n1:5_0: and paid respects to their own flail.
